channel.title: Compiling Hyperion with ANT
channel.description:
I tried making it so I could build my server with ant but I keep getting: [code]'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I have the ant folder in my main directory for the server and the build.xml file looks like this: [code]<project default="compile" basedir=".">
<property name="src" location="src" /> <property name="build" location="bin" /> <property name="lib" location="lib" /> <property name="jar" location="rs.jar" />
<target name="compile"> <delete file="${jar}" /> <javac srcdir="${src}" destdir="${build}" debug="on" target="1.5"> <classpath> <pathelement location="${lib}/commons-compress-1.0.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/junit-4.6.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/jython.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/xpp3.jar" /> <pathelement location="${lib}/xstream.jar" /> <pathelement path="${java.class.path}/"/> </classpath> </javac> <jar basedir="${build}" destfile="${jar}" /> </target> </project>[/code] Here's my compile.bat also: [code]@echo off ant build pause[/code] EDIT: Ok I got that first problem fixed but now it just runs and exits right away. I have tried using pause and exit at the end and it wont stop/pause. Is there a way to get it to pause so I can see why it's not working?

item.title: Compiling Hyperion with ANT
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

I tried making it so I could build my server with ant but I keep getting:

'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
I have the ant folder in my main directory for the server and the build.xml file looks like this:

[code]

    <property name="src" location="src" />
    <property name="build" location="bin" />
    <property name="lib" location="lib" />
    <property name="jar" location="rs.jar" />
    
    <target name="compile">
            <delete file="${jar}" />                
            <javac srcdir="${src}" destdir="${build}" debug="on" target="1.5">
              <classpath>
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/commons-compress-1.0.jar" />                        
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/junit-4.6.jar" />
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/jython.jar" />
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar" />
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar" />
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar" />
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/xpp3.jar" />
                    <pathelement location="${lib}/xstream.jar" />
                    <pathelement path="${java.class.path}/"/>        
              </classpath>
            </javac>
            <jar basedir="${build}" destfile="${jar}" />
    </target>

[/code]
Here’s my compile.bat also:

@echo off ant build pause
EDIT: Ok I got that first problem fixed but now it just runs and exits right away. I have tried using pause and exit at the end and it wont stop/pause. Is there a way to get it to pause so I can see why it’s not working?
